name: Factmata
goal: Building automated and assisted fact checking tools and technologies, and fake news monitoring algorithms (including hate speech, hyperpartisan, controversial and other classifications of content).
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Information Society, Taxation
euInitiatives:
ALDE: The Future of News in a HyperConnected World

Digital Agenda Intergroup / CDT: Illegal Content Online / Protecting Human Rights
